page.title: 08Tourism In Whitby.
page.content: Whitby depends more on its{tourism than its shipping trade to bring employment and wealth to the town. The main holiday season is primarily between May and October.Many private residences have been converted to{Bed {and Breakfast/Flatlet}accommodation. Visitors stay one or two weeks, or come on one of the many day coach excursions to the area. { Gift shops}and{cafes}open especially for the season.There are several{ {amusement arcades}down near the sea front and donkey rides are available on the beach. Holiday makers like to sunbathe, weather permitting! The tourists, who are welcomed for their trade and interest in the area, sometimes cause concern to the local community because of the{litter}and {parking congestion}they bring.
